top_stories.title: French and Malaysian authorities are investigating Grok for generating sexualized deepfakes
top_stories.description: France and Malaysia have joined India in condemning Grok for creating sexualized deepfakes of women and minors.
top_stories.author: Anthony Ha
top_stories.content: France and Malaysia have joined India in condemning Grok for creating sexualized deepfakes of women and minors.

top_stories.title: DeepSeek introduces Manifold-Constrained Hyper-Connections for R2
top_stories.description: Just before the start of the new year, the artificial intelligence community was introduced to a potential breakthrough in model training. A team of researchers from the Chinese AI firm DeepSeek released a paper outlining a novel architectural approach called Manifold-Constrained Hyper-Connections, or mHC for short. This new methodology may provide a pathway for engineers […]
top_stories.author: Kerem Gülen
top_stories.content: Just before the start of the new year, the artificial intelligence community was introduced to a potential breakthrough in model training. A team of researchers from the Chinese AI firm DeepSeek released a paper outlining a novel architectural approach called Manifold-Constrained Hyper-Connections, or mHC for short. This new methodology may provide a pathway for engineers […]

top_stories.title: Boston Dynamics and Google DeepMind partner to make Atlas smarter
top_stories.description: Boston Dynamics announced a strategic partnership with Google DeepMind at the Hyundai press conference during CES 2026 to accelerate development of its next-generation humanoid robot Atlas by integrating DeepMind’s AI foundation models. The collaboration focuses on robotics research using Google DeepMind’s AI foundation models to enable Atlas to act more human around people. Atlas serves […]
top_stories.author: Aytun Çelebi
top_stories.content: Boston Dynamics announced a strategic partnership with Google DeepMind at the Hyundai press conference during CES 2026 to accelerate development of its next-generation humanoid robot Atlas by integrating DeepMind’s AI foundation models. top_stories.title: AI agent-driven browser automation for enterprise workflow management
top_stories.description: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. Despite significant technology investments, knowledge workers routinely navigate between eight to twelve different web applications during standard workflows, constantly switching contexts and manually transferring information between systems. Data entry and validation tasks […]
top_stories.author: Kosti Vasilakakis

top_stories.title: NVIDIA Expands Global DRIVE Hyperion Ecosystem to Accelerate the Road to Full Autonomy
top_stories.description: At the CES trade show running this week in Las Vegas, NVIDIA announced that the global DRIVE Hyperion ecosystem is expanding to include tier 1 suppliers, automotive integrators and sensor partners, including Aeva, AUMOVIO, Astemo, Arbe, Bosch, Hesai, Magna, Omnivision, Quanta, Sony and ZF Group. This builds on collaborations unveiled at NVIDIA GTC Washington, D.C., Read Article
top_stories.author: Mo Poorsartep
